comments.body:
Patch #1 doesn't solve parquet_schema_evolution.q execution error because secondary bug gets hit.  Needs more tests to make sure setValue/writeValue exercised for all the complex types.

The Q files null_cast.q and nested_column_pruning.q also hit secondary bugs, too.
